content: Based on the BBC annual report and accounts, the specific types of factual programming that receives the most funding on BBC2 are current affairs programs, such as the flagship program Newsnight; natural history documentaries, like the popular series 'Planet Earth II'; and history documentaries, like 'The Last Kingdom' and 'The Rise of the Nazis'. These types of programming require a significantly larger budget because of high production values and the need for extended periods of location filming. Other factual programming, such as lifestyle and travel shows, typically require less funding.
